frame.name: Point_of_dispute
frame.definition:
<def-root>The answer to a <fen>Question</fen> is under discussion in a <fen>Group</fen>, which still has a difference of opinion among its members. The prominence of the <fen>Question</fen> relative to others can be indicated by a <fen>Status</fen> expression.
<ex>Firstly, it is quite clear the <t>issue</t> <fex name="con">in this context</fex> <m>was</m> <fex name="que">not so much apostasy as much as it was treason</fex>.</ex>
<ex>The <t>question</t> <fex name="con">in Finucane's case</fex> <m>is</m> <fex name="que">this</fex>: will an inquiry bring out the truth?</ex>
<ex><fex name="Question">It</fex> <m>remains</m> an <t>issue</t> <fex name="sta">of central importance to women</fex> .</ex>
<ex>Democracy in Serbia was blocked by the <fex name="des">unresolved</fex> <fex name="que">national</fex> <t>question</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Question
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Question</fen> is an open proposition the answer to which is under dispute.
<ex>The <t>issue</t> is <fex name="que">who will have control of Iraq's rich oil resources</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Group
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Group</fen> are the persons or organizations who have different points of view on the <fen>Question</fen>.
</def-root>

FE.name: Status
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Frame Element <fen>Status</fen> is used for expressions that indicate the relative importance of a <fen>Question</fen> with respect to the other topics that are disputed.
<ex>The <fex name="sta">main</fex> <t>issue</t> is where the revenue is coming in from.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>A characterization of the <fen>Question</fen>, often with regard to its complexity or whether it has been resolved or not.
<ex>Two <fex name="des">unresolved</fex> <t>issues</t> fuel speculation that he might not receive a fair trial.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition:
<def-root>The area of human experience which the <fen>Question</fen> concerns.
<ex>The third sector of the Master Plan explores the important <fex name="dom">economic</fex> <t>issue</t> of tourism.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Context
FE.definition:
<def-root>A state or event within which the <fen>Question</fen> arises as a problem for the <fen>Group</fen>.
<ex>The <t>question</t> <fex name="Context">in Argentina's case</fex> is what exchange rate is appropriate now.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time interval during which the <fen>Question</fen> exists as a problem for the <fen>Group</fen>.
<ex>The <t>issue</t> <fex name="tim">at the time</fex> was whether or not to relocate the Rennes-based part of the team to California.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Viewpoint
FE.definition:
<def-root>An individual or individuals from whose point of view the <fen>Question</fen> is a point of dispute within the <fen>Group</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Viewpoint">For Elijah</fex>, the <t>issue</t> was between two altars: worship of God and worship of BaaI.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: issue.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an important topic for debate or resolution.

lexUnit.name: concern.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a matter of interest or importance.
